data.title: News + Events
data.meta_description: The latest in Paul Smith's College news, highlighting the latest from the college and its students, faculty, alumni and supporters.
data.text:
Paul Smith’s College announced its appointment of interim president Dan Kelting to president on August 19, 2024. As president, Kelting will focus on various strategic initiatives to bolster Paul Smith’s College’s next growth phase, including making college more accessible, growing student enrollment, increasing student retention rates and building support for the college through its external community.

Paul Smith’s College announced its appointment of interim president Dan Kelting to president on August 19, 2024. As president, Kelting will focus on various strategic initiatives to bolster Paul Smith’s College’s next growth phase, including making college more accessible, growing student enrollment, increasing student retention rates and building support for the college through its external community.

The Wild Center, Adirondack Explorer, Adirondack Research Consortium, and Paul Smith’s College have been selected to the new Earth to Sky Academy cohort as Team Adirondack. This multi-organization team highlights the local commitment to advancing climate...

Schedule for Orientation at Paul Smith’s College, Friday, May 31-Saturday, June 1, 2024

Paul Smiths, NY - Paul Smith’s College Visitors Interpretive Center (VIC) opens its Fall 2023 lecture series Saturday, October 14, 2023, at 3:00 p.m. with Of Monarchs and Milkweed with Professor Anurag Agrawal, Cornell University. Dr. Agrawal holds the James Perkins...

Onchiota, New York - On Saturday, September 16 at noon there will be a public unveiling of a historic roadside marker to celebrate the recent naming of John Thomas Brook. The new name pays homage to 19th-century Black settler John Thomas. John Thomas escaped...

Paul Smiths, NY - The Paul Smith’s College’s Visitors Interpretive Center (VIC) announced the completion of a Forest Megaphone on its accessible Barnum Brook Trail. The Forest Megaphone, an oversized wooden megaphone large enough for adults to sit or laydown in,...
